subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description: The project is implemented jointly with the UN Integrated Mission in Timor-Leste. It includes: 1) undertaking a public perceptions survey of the security sector; 2) completing a strategic review of the security sector; 3) providing technical assistance to bridge capacity gaps; and 4) Implementing priority capacity development initiatives.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Security Sector Review

subproject.title: Security Sector Review

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description: The project is implemented jointly with the UN Integrated Mission in Timor-Leste. It will promote the four dimensions of security sector reform, namely, civilian oversight, operational management, financial accountability and policy research capacity to ensure peace and stability in Timor-Leste.
subproject.title: Capacity Development Facility

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description: The project is implemented jointly with the UN Integrated Mission in Timor-Leste. It will promote the four dimensions of security sector reform, namely, civilian oversight, operational management, financial accountability and policy research capacity to ensure peace and stability in Timor-Leste.
subproject.title: Capacity Development Facility

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description: The project is implemented jointly with the UN Integrated Mission in Timor-Leste. The project will contribute to: (1) enhancing civilian oversight and management capacity in priority areas identified by national partners, and (2) improving research and training capacity in the security sector. It will provide technical assistance for policy oversight, legal and institutional development and capacity building in the Parliament, the Secretariats of State for Defence and Security; and the Office of the President.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: SSR Oversight and management

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description: The project is implemented jointly with the UN Police. It will (1) contribute to the development of  the National Police  management and administration capacity; (2) enhance its capacity through targeted training; (3) strengthen its internal oversight mechanisms and (4) support the Secretariat of State for Security in finalizing the promotions regime.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Strengthening National Police
